short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Witcher 3 wallpaper turn new tab to HD The Witcher 3 background. Custom The Witcher 3 wallpaper theme for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Cycle through The Witcher 3 wallpapers every time a new tab is opened.
2. Rotate or pin your favorite The Witcher 3 backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize a Google-powered search bar.
4. Convenient links to your emails and social networks.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for rapid website access.
10. Direct links to Google applications.
11. Instant access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing to social media platforms.
13. Fast access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to gaming portals.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your The Witcher 3 new tab.
